metadata.title: CVE-2024-38628 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: gadget: u_audio: Fix race condition use of controls after free duringgadget unbind.Hang on to the control IDs instead of pointers since those are correctlyhandled with locks.
